#Importing libraries for Exploratory data analysis and plotting
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
%matplotlib inline
import seaborn as sns
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")
source.5f918d45:
#Created a dataframe by grouping country with sum of passengers
most_crowded_airport =pd.DataFrame(df.groupby("Country").sum()["Passengers"].sort_values(ascending=False))[:10]
most_crowded_airport.head()
source.38e5a5bd:
#Plotting Bar chart to show most crowded airport
most_crowded_airport[:10].plot(kind="bar",figsize=(15,7),color = ("salmon"))
plt.xticks(rotation=0)
plt.xlabel("Country",fontsize=(20))
plt.ylabel("Passenger count in billions",fontsize=(20))
plt.title("Most crowded Airport",fontsize=(20));
source.10189dd2:
#Grouping Year column with passengers column to creat dataframe
passenger_year = pd.DataFrame(df.groupby("Year").sum()["Passengers"].sort_values(ascending=False))[:10]
passenger_year
source.0809ebf8:
#Plotting Bar chart to show most & least passengers of year
passenger_year.plot(kind="bar",color=["lightblue"],figsize=(15,5))
plt.xticks(rotation=0)
plt.xlabel("Year",fontsize=(20))
plt.ylabel("Passenger count in billion",fontsize=(20))
plt.title("Year having most & least no of passengers",fontsize=(20));
